price: (16) Move not your tongue with it, [O Muḥammad], to hasten with it [i.e., recitation of the Qur’ān].
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
